mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Instructions for making of a clock like one stolen from his study; list of items to be purchased; books to be purchased including Abbe Brotier's Tacitus, Buffon's works, the works of the King of Prussia, the Encyclopie and Encyclopedie ancienne; housekeeping tasks to be accomplished; items to be packed; servants to be dismissed and their wages paid; items to be sent from Paris to Havre and then to New York.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
Tacitus, Cornelius
Buffon, Georges Louis Leclerc, comte de, 1707-1788
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1790 April 6, New York, [New York], to William Short, n.p.
